name: AKM
description: The AKM is a 7.62mm assault rifle originating from Russia. It is widely used by military forces around the world for its reliability in harsh conditions.

name: M416
description: The M416 is a 5.56mm assault rifle developed by Heckler & Koch in Germany. It is known for its modular design and is used by various special forces.

name: Kar98k
description: The Kar98k is a German bolt-action sniper rifle that was widely used during World War II. It remains popular with marksmen for its precision.

name: AWM
description: The AWM (Arctic Warfare Magnum) is a British bolt-action sniper rifle known for its high accuracy and range. It is used by military and police snipers.

name: Uzi
description: The Uzi is an Israeli 9mm submachine gun known for its compact size and high rate of fire. It is used by security forces and military units.

name: UMP45
description: The UMP45 is a submachine gun developed by Heckler & Koch in Germany. Chambered in .45 ACP, it is used by law enforcement and military forces for close quarters combat.

name: S686
description: The S686 is an Italian over-under double-barreled shotgun known for its reliability and precision. It is popular among sport shooters and hunters.

name: SKS
description: The SKS is a Soviet semi-automatic carbine chambered in 7.62x39mm. It was widely used by Eastern Bloc countries during the Cold War and remains popular among collectors.

name: QBZ
description: The QBZ-95 is a Chinese bullpup-style assault rifle chambered in 5.8x42mm. It is the standard issue rifle for the People's Liberation Army.

name: DP-28
description: The DP-28 is a Soviet light machine gun chambered in 7.62x54mmR. Known for its distinctive pan magazine, it was widely used during World War II and beyond.

name: Desert Eagle
description: The Desert Eagle is a powerful semi-automatic pistol known for its high caliber rounds. It is used by military forces and in competitive shooting.

name: DBS
description: The DBS is a double-barreled pump-action bullpup shotgun. It is known for its high damage output and is popular among close-quarters combat units.

name: Glock 17
description: The Glock 17 is a 9mm semi-automatic pistol used by military and law enforcement agencies worldwide for its reliability and ease of use.

name: Colt Python
description: The Colt Python is a .357 Magnum caliber revolver. It is known for its accuracy and smooth trigger pull, making it a favorite among revolver enthusiasts.

name: Winchester Model 70
description: The Winchester Model 70 is a bolt-action rifle known for its accuracy and is often used in hunting and sporting competitions.

name: Benelli M4
description: The Benelli M4 is a semi-automatic shotgun known for its reliability and performance in tactical situations. It is used by military and law enforcement.

name: Remington 870
description: The Remington 870 is a pump-action shotgun popular among hunters, sport shooters, and law enforcement for its versatility and durability.

name: FN SCAR
description: The FN SCAR is a modular assault rifle used by military forces for its adaptability and performance in various combat scenarios.

name: Barrett M82
description: The Barrett M82 is a recoil-operated, semi-automatic anti-materiel rifle. It is used for long-range targeting and can penetrate hard targets.

name: MP5
description: The MP5 is a 9mm submachine gun developed by Heckler & Koch. It is used by special forces and law enforcement units for its compact size and accuracy.

name: Colt M1911
description: The Colt M1911 is a single-action, semi-automatic pistol. It was the standard-issue sidearm for the U.S. Armed Forces for many years.

name: M24
description: The M24 is a military and police sniper rifle used for its high accuracy and reliability. It is based on the Remington 700 platform.
